lead_paragraph: Gregory Cucchiara was convicted last month of second-degree murder for beating and drowning his mother in 2011 and smothering his father in 2012.

headline.print_headline: Man Is Sentenced  for Killing Parents
headline.main: Queens Man, 40, Sentenced for Killing His Parents

snippet: Gregory Cucchiara was convicted last month of second-degree murder for beating and drowning his mother in 2011 and smothering his father in 2012.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court sentences Gregory Cucchiara of Queens to 50 years to life in prison for murder of his mother in 2011 and of his father in 2012; Cucchiara was convicted in January of two counts of second-degree murder in killings.
